functions.name: scan_mcp_servers
functions.description: Scans for configured MCP servers and returns their status.

functions.name: inspect_mcp_server
functions.description: Connects to a specific MCP server to discover its available tools and resources.

server_name.description: The name of the server (from config) to inspect.

functions.name: create_mcp_plugin
functions.description: Generates a standalone G-Assist plugin for a specific MCP server.

server_name.description: The name of the server to generate a plugin for.

plugin_name.description: The name for the new plugin (e.g., 'mcp-filesystem').
